name: Familiar (itch)
description:
Familiar by Rabbit House

You and your familiars can explore the villages, forests and snowy mountains whilst collecting treasure along the way in this action adventure game.

Developed with Unity 5.5.0f3 in C#

K1430895 Evan Faulkner - Environmental Artist/Level Designer

K1415709 Philip Greene - Team Leader/Lead Programmer

K1427303 Amy Hoang - Lead Artist/Character Artist

K1417804 Lewis Hopkins - Producer/Junior Programmer

K1420713 Alvin Wei - Programmer/UX
